vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
WhaleGiveaway1.GetFreebie (patch_1.sol#12-17) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- Owner.transfer(this.balance) (patch_1.sol#14)
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_1.sol#15)

solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_1.sol:
